Package room

Class RoomManager

java.lang.Object
room.RoomManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileIO.ReadWrite
public class RoomManager extends Object implements FileIO.ReadWrite
Contains control methods to manage the guest records. Implements ReadWrite interface to do file input and output.
Since:
2022-04-17
Version:
1.0
Author:
BRYAN WU JIAHE

  • Constructor Details

    • RoomManager

      private RoomManager()
      Private constructor that loads the roomList by reading from file "roomlist.txt". Prints error message if reading is failed.

      Returns:
      the found Room object, or null if not found.

      Parameters:

      print - The variable indicating whether to print this Room's details.

      the found Room object, or null if not found.

      public Room getAvailableRoom(Room.RoomType roomType, Room.BedType bedType)

      Parameters:
      roomType - The requested room type.
      bedType - The requested room type.
      Returns:
      the available Room if any, otherwise return null.

    • roomNumberExists

      public boolean roomNumberExists(String roomNumber)
      Checks whether a room number exists in the hotel.
      Parameters:
      roomNumber - The room number to check.
      Returns:
      true if exists, otherwise false.

    • printOccupancyReport

      public void printOccupancyReport()
      Prints the occupancy report of each room type in the hotel. Lists out in order of Single, Double, Suite and VIP Suite.

    • printOccupancyUtil

      private void printOccupancyUtil(ArrayList<Room> list)
      Prints the details of the occupancy report of one room type.
      Parameters:
      list - The room list of a specific room type.

    • printStatusReport

      public void printStatusReport()
      Prints the status report of the hotel rooms. Lists out in order of Vacant, Occupied, Reserved and Under Maintenance.

    • printRoomReport

      public void printRoomReport()
      Prints the room report of the hotel rooms. The details include the room's WIFI availability, smoking policies and balcony information.

    • printRoomUtil

      private void printRoomUtil(ArrayList<Room> list)
      Prints all the room numbers of a list of specific type of rooms.
      Parameters:
      list - The list of specific type of rooms.

    • printRoomDetails

      public void printRoomDetails(String roomNumber)
      Prints the room details of a Room. Reads in the room number to access the Room's record.
      Parameters:
      roomNumber - The number of the Room to print.

    • updateRoomNumber

      public void updateRoomNumber(String roomNumber, String newRoomNumber)
      Updates the room number of a Room. The new room number should be four digits and not overlap an existing room number. Prints error message if the room number is invalid.
      Parameters:
      roomNumber - The number of the Room to update.
      newRoomNumber - The updated room number.

    • updateRoomType

      Parameters:

      roomType - The updated room type.
